title: Tokyo Vice
opening_song: "Kaori ga Kieta Yoru (香りが消えた夜)" by Kyoumoto Masaki
ending_song: "Kaze no Sailor (風のセーラ)" by Kyoumoto Masaki
sinopse: One night at a rock concert, a mysterious man dies while leaving a floppy disc with a member of the Rutz Detective Agency. Soon they realize the disk contains information about a deadly new weapon under development. The heroes become involved in a game of political subterfuge and military espionage, hot on the trail of the killer!
